page.title: 20Monmouth CommunITel
page.content: {CommunITel}is a system designed to implement a{Prestel}type local viewdata system. A host system has been set up at{Monmouth Comprehensive {School}and a local system at{Mitchel {Troy Primary School. The children of both schools have created their own viewdata magazines called{MonITel and Troytel.}At Mitchel Troy the magazine is broadcast in the dining room during mealtimes using a carousel option. The children are able to send and receive messages down the phone lines using a modem connected to their computers. A{Telepal}system has been devised where children from the Primary School correspond with children at the Comprehensive School. It is hoped that more schools will join in the scheme in the future.
